author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

The support from rfio protocol was removed in 2017 by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18661. This PR cleans up the remaining references to it from the framework code.

As a byproduct the `IOPool/TFileAdaptor/test/tfileTest.cpp` is turned into a real unit test.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1362

#### PR validation:

Framework unit tests succeed.
title: Remove last references to rfio protocol from framework and related code
